data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will affect southern China gradually tomorrow. It will become appreciably cooler over the region in the following couple of days, and cold in the morning and at night over inland areas. The weather will become fine. With the monsoon moderating gradually in the middle and latter parts of next week, temperatures will rise and the weather will be relatively humid over the coastal areas of Guangdong.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260131","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, becoming north force 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches at first. Visibility relatively low in some areas. Bright periods in the afternoon.
